member.name: IAudioSessionEnumerator.GetCount
member.summary: The GetCount method gets the total number of audio sessions that are open on the audio device.
member.param: Receives the total number of audio sessions.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAudioSessionEnumerator.GetSession
member.summary: The GetSession method gets the audio session specified by an audio session number.
member.param: The session number. If there are n sessions, the sessions are numbered from 0 to n – 1. To get the number of sessions, call the method.
Receives a pointer to the interface of the session object in the collection that is maintained by the session enumerator. The caller must release the interface pointer.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAudioSessionEnumerator
member.summary: The IAudioSessionEnumerator interface enumerates audio sessions on an audio device. To get a reference to the IAudioSessionEnumerator interface of the session enumerator object, the application must call .
